title: Botswana Loans To Private Sector
description: Loans to Private Sector in Botswana decreased to 25264.69 BWP Million in August from 25289.60 BWP Million in July of 2022. Loans to Private Sector in Botswana averaged 15740.91 BWP Million from 2007 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 25289.60 BWP Million in July of 2022 and a record low of 4374.33 BWP Million in January of 2007. This page provides - Botswana Loans To Private Sector- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Botswana
